amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-78 to give members of the Reserve Component the option to use Military Medical Treatment Facilities closest to home for treatment on an outpatient basis of injuries sustained in theater.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-78 to give members of the Reserve Component the option to use Military Medical Treatment Facilities closest to home for treatment on an outpatient basis of injuries sustained in theater.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Hooley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
